DOC.HEADLINE: PEOPLE
DOC.TEXT: Pamela J . Bjorkman , assistant_professor of biology at Caltech , won a Gairdner Foundation award for research on the immune_system . She shares the $ 30 # 000 award , which will be presented in October , with Don C . Wiley of Harvard_University . Bjorkman and Wiley are among five winners of the international awards recognizing contributions to medical_science . Pamela J . Bjorkman
